original_title: 工場長夫人の湿ったパンスト
overview: Due to the prolonged recession, orders to the small town factory run by her husband have decreased sharply. She is a sighing husband who worries about the lives of his employees. As a sales representative, I went to the president of a business partner to ask her to place an order, but... What was sought there was obscene conditions in exchange for ordering.
title: The Wet Pantyhose of the Wife of the Factory Manager. Hikari Kisaki
